committees.committee: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

official_title: A resolution expressing support for designation of October 7, 2010, as "Jumpstart's Read for the Record Day".
subjects: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

summary.text: Supports the designation of October 7, 2010, as Jumpstart's Read for the Record Day. Recognizes the fifth year of Jumpstart's Read for the Record. (Jumpstart is a national nonprofit early childhood education organization.) Encourages adults to: (1) join children in creating the world's largest shared reading experience; and (2) show their support for early literacy and Jumpstart's early education programming for young children in low-income communities.

titles.title: A resolution expressing support for designation of October 7, 2010, as "Jumpstart's Read for the Record Day".
